title: Add Girls’ Aesthetic catalog static imagery assets

requirements.summary: Add trendy/aesthetic high-quality Girls’ Aesthetic collection + product images as local static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: New image files exist in frontend/public/assets/generated matching the filenames listed in imageRequirements.required.
Images are visually consistent (same lighting/grade), high resolution, and appropriate for a modern trendy/aesthetic fashion look.
All image assets load successfully in the browser (no 404s).

file_operations.description: Add static image asset: Editorial fashion collection banner with trendy/aesthetic girls clothing styling. Ensure it matches the required filename exactly and is optimized for web delivery.
Add static image asset: High-resolution product photo (trendy baby tee laid flat, neutral background). Ensure it matches the required filename exactly and is optimized for web delivery.
Add static image asset: High-resolution product photo (pleated mini skirt, studio lighting). Ensure it matches the required filename exactly and is optimized for web delivery.
Add static image asset: High-resolution product photo (cropped hoodie, soft shadows). Ensure it matches the required filename exactly and is optimized for web delivery.
Add static image asset: High-resolution product photo (ribbed tank top, clean backdrop). Ensure it matches the required filename exactly and is optimized for web delivery.
Add static image asset: High-resolution product photo (baggy jeans, studio background). Ensure it matches the required filename exactly and is optimized for web delivery.
Add static image asset: High-resolution product photo (oversized graphic tee, editorial lighting). Ensure it matches the required filename exactly and is optimized for web delivery.
Add static image asset: High-resolution product photo (knit cardigan, warm tone lighting). Ensure it matches the required filename exactly and is optimized for web delivery.
Add static image asset: High-resolution product photo (slip dress, minimal studio setting). Ensure it matches the required filename exactly and is optimized for web delivery.
